definition: third of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/third in order/letter "C" or Roman "III" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 165°/propyl
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Chapter Four is on the synthesis and resolution of phenylalanine .
sentences.chinese: 第四章研究苯丙氨酸人工合成及拆分。

sentences.english: It is one of the two components of aspartame .
sentences.chinese: 它也是天门冬氨醯苯丙氨酸甲酯的两种成分之一。

sentences.english: After acidic hydrolysis, phenylalanine was obtained with total yield of 62.5%.
sentences.chinese: 然后经酸性水解得苯丙氨酸消旋体。

sentences.english: The manufacture and application of phenylalanine were summarized in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 综述了苯丙氨酸的生产和应用。

sentences.english: The third part was to study the relationship of phenylalanine with intracellular free calcium.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分研究苯丙氨酸对神经元胞浆游离钙的影响。

sentences.english: D-phenylalanine had the gratuitous effect on the inducing of PAL.
sentences.chinese: 苯丙氨酸对于PAL的产生具有安慰诱导作用。

sentences.english: Labelled shikimic acid is reality converted to phenylalanine.
sentences.chinese: 标记的莽草酸迅速地转变成苯丙氨酸。

sentences.english: The treatment includes maintaining a diet with low levels of phenylalanine.
sentences.chinese: 对该疾病的治疗包括维持摄入低苯丙氨酸的饮食。

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
